00027 typedef struct {
00028         double x;
00029         double y;
00030         double z;
00031 } ARPoint3D;
00032 
00033 
00037 typedef enum {
00038         ARPoint3DCoordinateX = 0,
00039         ARPoint3DCoordinateY,
00040         ARPoint3DCoordinateZ,
00041         
00042         ARPoint3DCoordinateCount
00043 } ARPoint3DCoordinate;

00049 const ARPoint3D ARPoint3DZero;
00050 
00051 
00059 static inline ARPoint3D ARPoint3DMake(double x, double y, double z) {
00060         ARPoint3D result = {x, y, z};
00061         return result;
00062 }
00063 
00072 static inline BOOL ARPoint3DEquals(ARPoint3D a, ARPoint3D b) {
00073         return
00074                 a.x == b.x &&
00075                 a.y == b.y &&
00076                 a.z == b.z;
00077 }
00078 
00086 static inline BOOL ARPoint3DEqualsWithAccuracy(ARPoint3D a, ARPoint3D b, double accuracy) {
00087         return
00088                 fabs(a.x - b.x) <= accuracy &&
00089                 fabs(a.y - b.y) <= accuracy &&
00090                 fabs(a.z - b.z) <= accuracy;
00091 }
00092 
00099 static inline double ARPoint3DGetCoordinate(ARPoint3D point, ARPoint3DCoordinate coordinate) {
00100         NSCAssert(coordinate >= 0 && coordinate <= 2, @"Unexpected coordinate.");
00101         
00102         return ((double *)&point)[coordinate];
00103 }
00104 
00111 static inline void ARPoint3DSetCoordinate(ARPoint3D *point, ARPoint3DCoordinate coordinate, double value) {
00112         NSCAssert(coordinate >= 0 && coordinate <= 2, @"Unexpected coordinate.");
00113         
00114         ((double *)point)[coordinate] = value;
00115 }
00116 
00123 static inline double ARPoint3DDotProduct(ARPoint3D a, ARPoint3D b) {
00124         return
00125                 a.x * b.x +
00126                 a.y * b.y +
00127                 a.z * b.z;
00128 }
00129 
00137 static inline ARPoint3D ARPoint3DCrossProduct(ARPoint3D a, ARPoint3D b) {
00138         ARPoint3D result = {
00139                 a.y*b.z - a.z*b.y,
00140                 a.z*b.x - a.x*b.z,
00141                 a.x*b.y - a.y*b.x,
00142         };
00143         return result;
00144 }
00145 
00151 static inline double ARPoint3DLength(ARPoint3D point) {
00152         return sqrt(ARPoint3DDotProduct(point, point));
00153 }
00154 
00161 static inline ARPoint3D ARPoint3DAdd(ARPoint3D a, ARPoint3D b) {
00162         ARPoint3D result = {
00163                 a.x + b.x,
00164                 a.y + b.y,
00165                 a.z + b.z,
00166         };
00167         return result;
00168 }
00169 
00176 static inline ARPoint3D ARPoint3DSubtract(ARPoint3D a, ARPoint3D b) {
00177         ARPoint3D result = {
00178                 a.x - b.x,
00179                 a.y - b.y,
00180                 a.z - b.z,
00181         };
00182         return result;
00183 }
00184 
00191 static inline ARPoint3D ARPoint3DScale(ARPoint3D point, double scale) {
00192         ARPoint3D result = {
00193                 point.x * scale,
00194                 point.y * scale,
00195                 point.z * scale,
00196         };
00197         return result;
00198 }
00199 
00206 static inline ARPoint3D ARPoint3DNormalize(ARPoint3D point) {
00207         return ARPoint3DScale(point, 1. / ARPoint3DLength(point));
00208 }
